alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Mercer; Middlesex; Somerset; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 8:27PM EST until January 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, changing to sleet and freezing rain early Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Somerset, Middlesex, Western Monmouth, Eastern Monmouth and Mercer. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix may briefly change to plain rain Tuesday morning before changing back to a wintry mix before tapering off Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Monmouth; Mercer; Middlesex; Somerset; Western Monmouth
